{"games":[{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1196682,"totalDownVotes":128984,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":503237,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay. Thanks for playing!"},{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4278450,"totalDownVotes":784157,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":269047,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"👪¡Adoptar o ser adoptado, diseñar su casa, explorar la Isla de Adopción y mucho más! 👪

Créditos del juego: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/adopt-me-credits/71812"},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3817177,"totalDownVotes":314916,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":99158,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"¡Hola! ¡Actualmente estamos trabajando para mejorar nuestras traducciones al español!

¿Puedes resolver el misterio y sobrevivir en cada ronda?


INOCENTES: Corre y escóndete del asesino. Usa tus habilidades de detective para exponer al asesino.
SHERIFF: Trabaja con los inocentes; eres el único con un arma que puede derrotar al asesino.
ASESINO: Elimina a TODOS. Asegúrate que no te dispare el sheriff

¡Recoge y intercambia cientos de cuchillos!

Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 


¡Checa mi perfil para ver enlaces rápidos a mis páginas!


¡Dale me gusta, sigue y suscríbete para recibir noticias de actualización exclusivas, códigos de cuchillo gratis y más!

🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/4939446/RELL-GAMES#!/about"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":639085,"totalDownVotes":48420,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":70137,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3255440,"totalDownVotes":286558,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":68022,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2813664,"totalDownVotes":367708,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":39453,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"¡Corre hacia la cima a través de un enorme arsenal de armas! -Translation by "L_umin0us""},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":313238,"totalDownVotes":33103,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"『New STAND』 Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":28626,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"✨🏹『NEW STAND UPDATE』 🏹✨
➢ New stand (ANUBIZ), skins, reworks, and more!

Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and more! Read the help section in-game! JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

Give the game page a thumbs-up like and subscribe to our Youtube below for more codes:
➢ youtube.com/channel/UCwxB9DjiJKOcZbDPIvsCZBg?sub_confirmation=1

Disclaimers:
➢ You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":541666,"totalDownVotes":37942,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":35521,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies
⚡Each Unit has Unique Cool Abilities

⛩️Summon from the Gate and unlock New Units to use them in battles
🌀Team up with your friends to take on story mode or the infinity tower
🕒New things appear in the Summon Gate and Emote Shop every hour
Collect them all!

📝Join the Social Links to Gain Codes/Announcement/Updates
❤️Like the Game for More Codes!

🐦Creators: Benoxa, FruitySama, JokeTheFool
🐤Developers: Tacomura, AStrongMuscle, MoltenPrime, AngeIicMar
🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu "},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2088921,"totalDownVotes":288847,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🌼High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":50976,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌼New Update 5/3! Check the in-game update log in new servers (the book with the !) for full details!

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡

icon by @ixchoco_!"},{"creatorId":123247,"creatorName":"alexnewtron","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2213274,"totalDownVotes":302817,"universeId":140239261,"name":"💙 MeepCity 💙","placeId":370731277,"playerCount":86733,"imageToken":"T_370731277_ebb7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💙💙 Gra pobudzająca wyobraźnię!

Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":37703,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"The latest Jailbreak update is here! 
🕵️‍♀️ THE AGENT! Limited vehicle that shoots rockets! Now off sale.

🎉 5B Visits Garage Spoiler! TY for getting us here!! ❤️

🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over five billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089"},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":532080,"totalDownVotes":42928,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"🌌Tower Defense Simulator❄️","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":31598,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Dans ce monde, personne ne peut survivre seul. Faites équipe avec vos amis pour terrasser des vagues de zombies sans fins, combattre des boss, gagner des pièces, monter de niveau et acheter de nouvelles tours ! Si tu te sens prêt pour un challenge, essaye de battre les boss sur les difficultés supérieure !

 👥💵Rejoignez le groupe pour avoir 100$ de plus dès le début !
https://www.roblox.com/groups/4914494

 ⚠️CE JEU EST EN BETA. IL PEUT Y AVOIR DES BUGS. ⚠️

 🛠️MISES à JOURS🛠️
 + CAISSE DE JOUETS 📦
 + CARTE FIÈVRE DU PRINTEMPS 🌼
 + TOURS BOOSTÉES 
 + Correction de bugs 🛠️

Pour lire la liste complète des mises à jours: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/tower-defense-simulator-update-log

Hommages:
 🛠️Développeur en chef / Designer: BelowNatural
 📜Codeur: Razuatix
 🔨Builders: BiscuitTurtleKid & Beefchoplets
 🎹Compositeur de musique: Phoqus
 🔊Designer des effets spéciaux: BiddinUp"},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2169296,"totalDownVotes":666188,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":75567,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"¿Puedes ser el primero en llegar a la cima de este obby generado aleatoriamente sin ningún punto de control?

Si piensas que estas listo puedes probar la torre que contiene todas las 150 secciones aquí:
https://www.roblox.com/games/2127551566/THE-Tower-of-Hell

Los dueños de servidores VIP pueden usar los siguientes commandos
/setLength [3-150] para cambiar el tamaño de la torre seguido de
/skip para conseguir la próxima torre

Pedimos perdón por las personas que no pueden usar Shift-Lock debido a Roblox enlazando chat a Shift+7 en algunos teclados. Es un problema de Roblox que no podemos solucionar."},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1442193,"totalDownVotes":120499,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":42434,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

--- 300% more health!
--- 25% more gold!"},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1031204,"totalDownVotes":52042,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":24541,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

Builder: @BIack_Smith
Modeler: @Mirror_RBX"},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":707303,"totalDownVotes":95259,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 💧 [WATER & BANNERS!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":28200,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Islands!

🥁Music by https://twitter.com/too_many_fish"},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":154627,"totalDownVotes":8337,"universeId":648454481,"name":"🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":14757,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure game. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint"},{"creatorId":1235888,"creatorName":"The MLG Gang","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":22479,"totalDownVotes":1539,"universeId":2492481398,"name":"Noob Army Tycoon","placeId":6610021055,"playerCount":37288,"imageToken":"T_6610021055_7d68","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Attack the other noobs in this epic tycoon."},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1197844,"totalDownVotes":68204,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":20190,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2343269,"totalDownVotes":246350,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] CHAPTER 7!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":49006,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

Controls:
Pick up items / Use items - Click (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or Right Trigger (Controller)
Crouch / Place trap - CTRL (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or B (Controller)

Credits:
IK3As - Chapter 3, Chapter 7, Chapter 9, Chapter 11 Builder, Additional Chapter 8 Building, Book 2 Chapter 2 and 5 Building
Optikk - Build Mode
TenuousFlea - 'Billy' Model, 'Kraxicorde' Model
For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K."},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":279187,"totalDownVotes":145785,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":19341,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":192899,"totalDownVotes":31573,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ BLEACH ] Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":8945,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Check the second page of the roster to see JoJo characters.
 
Controls:
Shift: Sprint
Q: Dodge
F: Block
Basic Attack: Mouse1
Space+Mouse1: Aerial Attack
Combine Basic Attacks and Aerial Attacks to discover new combos.
Use 1,2,3,4 for your character special moves.
Transformation: G

Developers:  Melon_Sensei, Chicken_Man, Snakeworl
Contributors: BIGPAPAMAUI, Sprano, K1LLUA, Nilvaat, jjjakey, Kogrin, rikaid, Estheking"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":667283,"totalDownVotes":129272,"universeId":115797356,"name":"Counter Blox","placeId":301549746,"playerCount":8295,"imageToken":"T_301549746_2abf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Faça parte de uma luta de fogo baseada em equipes 5v5 em uma variedade de mapas espalhados pelo mundo.

Ganhe dinheiro no jogo eliminando inimigos e correndo atrás dos objetivos, que você pode usar para comprar novas armas, equipamentos e granadas no início de cada round."},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1804992,"totalDownVotes":141063,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":8070,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

[Update 5.5.1]
Map pool returned to normal non-holiday themed states
Added helmets for player models (no influence on bullet hitboxes)
New skins added to Creator Case and Meme 2 Case
Crane Site Revamp re-added to regular map pool

Thank you for continuing support for PF for over 5 years!"},{"creatorId":3333298,"creatorName":"Rumble Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":914720,"totalDownVotes":119065,"universeId":892043755,"name":"[🍀SUPER LUCK🍀] Bubble Gum Simulator","placeId":2512643572,"playerCount":10149,"imageToken":"T_2512643572_64e","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Super Luck Event!

- ⚡ 2x Hatch Speed

🚨 UPDATE 75 🚨

🔥 ??
